thread.section_title: BlogPress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlogPress | theblogpress.com
thread.title: Kim S., Therapist & First-Time Blogger
thread.title_full: BlogPress reviewed by Kim S., Therapist & First-Time Blogger

author: Kim S., Therapist & First-Time Blogger
title: Kim S., Therapist & First-Time Blogger
text: The service you get with BlogPress is amazing!!! They are hands-on and respond to questions within 24-hours. I've been shocked and so grateful for their level of help for the price. Absolutely worth it. You won't regret signing up with them.
